name: Key Bindings
description: $(li)Use Skill 1 - $(k:arcanearmaments.ability_1)$(li)Use Skill 2 - $(k:arcanearmaments.ability_2)$(li)Use Skill 3 - $(k:arcanearmaments.ability_3)$(li)Use Skill 4 - $(k:arcanearmaments.ability_4)$(br2)These can be changed in Options > Controls > Key Binds$(br2)Note: To use skills 2-4, you must first unlock them in the in the $(l:crafting_armory)Armory$()
